;;;43     {

;;;44     	_PROTOCOL_HEAD *pHead = NULL;

;;;45     	
;;;46     	realTime = RTC_GetCounter();//得到系统运行的RTC时间

;;;47     	
;;;48     	pHead = Mem_malloc(sizeof(_PROTOCOL_HEAD));

;;;49     	
;;;50     	pHead->magic    = 0x7E;

;;;51     	pHead->len      = t_htons(ptr->datLength - 3);   //MAP层数据长度

00001e  b288              UXTH     r0,r1

;;;52     	memcpy(pHead->device,varOperation.imei,16);      //拷贝设备唯一标识码 IMEI

;;;55     	
;;;56     	varOperation.sendId++;

;;;57     	
;;;58     	memcpy(ptr->data,pHead,sizeof(_PROTOCOL_HEAD));

00005e  4629              MOV      r1,r5
000060  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_memcpy
;;;59     	Mem_free(pHead);                                  //申请的内存块，用完一定要释放啊
000064  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000066  f7fffffe          BL       Mem_free
;;;60     	
;;;61     	crc = CRC_Compute16(&ptr->data[1],ptr->datLength-1);

00006c  1e51              SUBS     r1,r2,#1
00006e  6862              LDR      r2,[r4,#4]

000072  f7fffffe          BL       CRC_Compute16

;;;62     	
;;;63     	ptr->data[ptr->datLength++] = (crc>>8)&0xff;

;;;64     	ptr->data[ptr->datLength++] = crc&0xff;

000092  8020              STRH     r0,[r4,#0]
000094  6860              LDR      r0,[r4,#4]
000096  5481              STRB     r1,[r0,r2]
;;;65     	ptr->data[ptr->datLength++] = 0x7E;

;;;81     {    
;;;82     	//从Flash中载入数据进全局变量
;;;83     	Flash_ReadDat(SBOOT_UPGREAD_ADDR,(uint8_t *)&sysUpdateVar,sizeof(_SystemInformation));

                  LogReport PROC
;;;231    extern _CDMADataToSend* cdmaDataToSend;//CDMA发送的数据中（OBD、GPS），是通过它来作为载体
;;;232    void LogReport(char* fmt,...)          //上传日志文件
000000  b40f              PUSH     {r0-r3}
;;;233    {
000002  b57c              PUSH     {r2-r6,lr}
;;;234    	u8 datLen,err;
;;;235    	va_list ap;
;;;236    	uint8_t * ptrSaveLog;
;;;237    
;;;238    	if(cdmaDataToSend->datLength > 850)
000004  4821              LDR      r0,|L5.140|
000006  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; cdmaDataToSend
000008  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]
00000a  f2403152          MOV      r1,#0x352
00000e  4288              CMP      r0,r1
000010  dd02              BLE      |L5.24|
                  |L5.18|
;;;239    		return;
;;;240    	ptrSaveLog = Mem_malloc(500);
;;;241    	va_start(ap,fmt);
;;;242    	vsprintf((char*)(&ptrSaveLog[3]),fmt,ap);
;;;243    	va_end(ap);
;;;244    	
;;;245    	datLen=strlen((const char*)(&ptrSaveLog[3]));//此次发送数据的长度
;;;246    
;;;247    	ptrSaveLog[0] = datLen + 3;
;;;248    	ptrSaveLog[1] = 0x50;
;;;249    	ptrSaveLog[2] = 0x03;
;;;250    	
;;;251    	OSMutexPend(CDMASendMutex,0,&err);
;;;252    						
;;;253    	memcpy(&cdmaDataToSend->data[cdmaDataToSend->datLength],ptrSaveLog,ptrSaveLog[0]);
;;;254    	cdmaDataToSend->datLength += ptrSaveLog[0];
;;;255    	
;;;256    	OSMutexPost(CDMASendMutex);
;;;257    	Mem_free(ptrSaveLog);
;;;258    }
000012  bc7c              POP      {r2-r6}
000014  f85dfb14          LDR      pc,[sp],#0x14
                  |L5.24|
000018  f44f70fa          MOV      r0,#0x1f4             ;240
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       Mem_malloc
000020  4604              MOV      r4,r0                 ;240
000022  a807              ADD      r0,sp,#0x1c           ;241
000024  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]            ;241
000026  1ce0              ADDS     r0,r4,#3              ;242
000028  9a00              LDR      r2,[sp,#0]            ;242
00002a  9906              LDR      r1,[sp,#0x18]         ;242
00002c  f7fffffe          BL       __c89vsprintf
000030  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;243
000032  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]            ;243
000034  1ce0              ADDS     r0,r4,#3              ;245
000036  f7fffffe          BL       strlen
00003a  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0                 ;245
00003c  1ce8              ADDS     r0,r5,#3              ;247
00003e  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]            ;247
000040  2050              MOVS     r0,#0x50              ;248
000042  7060              STRB     r0,[r4,#1]            ;248
000044  2003              MOVS     r0,#3                 ;249
000046  70a0              STRB     r0,[r4,#2]            ;249
000048  aa01              ADD      r2,sp,#4              ;251
00004a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0                 ;251
00004c  4810              LDR      r0,|L5.144|
00004e  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]            ;251  ; CDMASendMutex
000050  f7fffffe          BL       OSMutexPend
000054  490d              LDR      r1,|L5.140|
000056  6809              LDR      r1,[r1,#0]            ;253  ; cdmaDataToSend
000058  6849              LDR      r1,[r1,#4]            ;253
00005a  4b0c              LDR      r3,|L5.140|
00005c  681b              LDR      r3,[r3,#0]            ;253  ; cdmaDataToSend
00005e  881b              LDRH     r3,[r3,#0]            ;253
000060  18c8              ADDS     r0,r1,r3              ;253
000062  7822              LDRB     r2,[r4,#0]            ;253
000064  4621              MOV      r1,r4                 ;253
000066  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_memcpy
00006a  4808              LDR      r0,|L5.140|
00006c  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]            ;254  ; cdmaDataToSend
00006e  8800              LDRH     r0,[r0,#0]            ;254
000070  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;254
000072  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1              ;254
000074  4905              LDR      r1,|L5.140|
000076  6809              LDR      r1,[r1,#0]            ;254  ; cdmaDataToSend
000078  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]            ;254
00007a  4805              LDR      r0,|L5.144|
00007c  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]            ;256  ; CDMASendMutex
00007e  f7fffffe          BL       OSMutexPost
000082  4620              MOV      r0,r4                 ;257
000084  f7fffffe          BL       Mem_free
000088  bf00              NOP      
00008a  e7c2              B        |L5.18|
;;;259    
                          ENDP

                  |L5.140|
                          DCD      cdmaDataToSend
                  |L5.144|
                          DCD      CDMASendMutex

                          AREA ||i.MemLog||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  MemLog PROC
;;;262    
;;;263    void MemLog(_CDMADataToSend* ptr)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;264    {
000002  b08c              SUB      sp,sp,#0x30
000004  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;265    	LogReport("m1:%d,%d;m2:%d,%d;m3:%d,%d;m4:%d,%d;m5:%d,%d;m6:%d,%d;m7:%d,%d;",\
000006  4814              LDR      r0,|L6.88|
000008  7b40              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0xd]  ; allMemState
00000a  4913              LDR      r1,|L6.88|
00000c  7b09              LDRB     r1,[r1,#0xc]  ; allMemState
00000e  4a12              LDR      r2,|L6.88|
000010  7ad2              LDRB     r2,[r2,#0xb]  ; allMemState
000012  4b11              LDR      r3,|L6.88|
000014  7a9b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0xa]  ; allMemState
000016  e9cd3207          STRD     r3,r2,[sp,#0x1c]
00001a  e9cd1009          STRD     r1,r0,[sp,#0x24]
00001e  480e              LDR      r0,|L6.88|
000020  7a40              LDRB     r0,[r0,#9]  ; allMemState
000022  490d              LDR      r1,|L6.88|
000024  7a0a              LDRB     r2,[r1,#8]  ; allMemState
000026  79c9              LDRB     r1,[r1,#7]  ; allMemState
000028  4b0b              LDR      r3,|L6.88|
00002a  799b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#6]  ; allMemState
00002c  e9cd3103          STRD     r3,r1,[sp,#0xc]
000030  e9cd2005          STRD     r2,r0,[sp,#0x14]
000034  4808              LDR      r0,|L6.88|
000036  7940              LDRB     r0,[r0,#5]  ; allMemState
000038  4907              LDR      r1,|L6.88|
00003a  7909              LDRB     r1,[r1,#4]  ; allMemState
00003c  4a06              LDR      r2,|L6.88|
00003e  78d2              LDRB     r2,[r2,#3]  ; allMemState
000040  e9cd2100          STRD     r2,r1,[sp,#0]
000044  9002              STR      r0,[sp,#8]
000046  4804              LDR      r0,|L6.88|
000048  7883              LDRB     r3,[r0,#2]  ; allMemState
00004a  7842              LDRB     r2,[r0,#1]  ; allMemState
00004c  7801              LDRB     r1,[r0,#0]  ; allMemState
00004e  a003              ADR      r0,|L6.92|
000050  f7fffffe          BL       LogReport
;;;266    			allMemState.memUsedNum1,allMemState.memUsedMax1,\
;;;267    			allMemState.memUsedNum2,allMemState.memUsedMax2,\
;;;268    			allMemState.memUsedNum3,allMemState.memUsedMax3,\
;;;269    			allMemState.memUsedNum4,allMemState.memUsedMax4,\
;;;270    			allMemState.memUsedNum5,allMemState.memUsedMax5,\
;;;271    			allMemState.memUsedNum6,allMemState.memUsedMax6,\
;;;272    			allMemState.memUsedNum7,allMemState.memUsedMax7);
;;;273    }
000054  b00c              ADD      sp,sp,#0x30
000056  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;274    
                          ENDP

                  |L6.88|
                          DCD      allMemState
                  |L6.92|
00005c  6d313a25          DCB      "m1:%d,%d;m2:%d,%d;m3:%d,%d;m4:%d,%d;m5:%d,%d;m6:%d,%d;m"
000060  642c2564
000064  3b6d323a
000068  25642c25
00006c  643b6d33
000070  3a25642c
000074  25643b6d
000078  343a2564
00007c  2c25643b
000080  6d353a25
000084  642c2564
000088  3b6d363a
00008c  25642c25
000090  643b6d  
000093  373a2564          DCB      "7:%d,%d;",0
000097  2c25643b
00009b  00      

                          AREA ||i.RecvDataAnalysis||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  RecvDataAnalysis PROC
;;;117    
;;;118     uint8_t* RecvDataAnalysis(uint8_t* ptrDataToDeal)//解析接收到的数据包
000000  e92d47f0          PUSH     {r4-r10,lr}
;;;119    {
000004  4605              MOV      r5,r0
;;;120    	uint16_t  i = 0;
000006  2600              MOVS     r6,#0
;;;121    	uint16_t datLen   = 0;
000008  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
;;;122    	uint16_t crcDat   = 0;
00000a  46a0              MOV      r8,r4
;;;123    	uint16_t crcCheck = 0;
00000c  46a1              MOV      r9,r4
;;;124    	uint8_t* ptr = NULL;
00000e  2700              MOVS     r7,#0
;;;125    	while(1)
000010  e00e              B        |L7.48|
                  |L7.18|
;;;126    	{
;;;127    		if(ptrDataToDeal[i++] == 0x7E)
000012  4630              MOV      r0,r6
000014  1c71              ADDS     r1,r6,#1
000016  b28e              UXTH     r6,r1
000018  5c28              LDRB     r0,[r5,r0]
00001a  287e              CMP      r0,#0x7e
00001c  d100              BNE      |L7.32|
;;;128    			break;
00001e  e008              B        |L7.50|
                  |L7.32|
;;;129    		if(i >= 60)
000020  2e3c              CMP      r6,#0x3c
000022  db05              BLT      |L7.48|
;;;130    		{
;;;131    			Mem_free(ptrDataToDeal);
000024  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000026  f7fffffe          BL       Mem_free
;;;132    			return NULL;
00002a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
                  |L7.44|
;;;133    		}
;;;134    	}
;;;135    	datLen   = ptrDataToDeal[i++];
;;;136    	datLen   = (datLen << 8) + ptrDataToDeal[i--];
;;;137    	crcCheck = CRC_Compute16(&ptrDataToDeal[i],datLen + 2);
;;;138    	
;;;139    	crcDat   = ptrDataToDeal[i + datLen +2];
;;;140    	crcDat   = (crcDat << 8) + ptrDataToDeal[i + datLen +3];
;;;141    	if(crcCheck != crcDat)
;;;142    	{
;;;143    		Mem_free(ptrDataToDeal);
;;;144    		return NULL;
;;;145    	}
;;;146    	ptr = Mem_malloc(datLen);
;;;147    	datLen = datLen - 24;
;;;148    	ptr[0] = (datLen >> 8)  & 0x00FF;
;;;149    	ptr[1] = datLen & 0x00FF;
;;;150    	memcpy(&ptr[2],&ptrDataToDeal[i + 26],datLen);
;;;151    	
;;;152    	Mem_free(ptrDataToDeal);
;;;153    	return ptr;
;;;154    }
00002c  e8bd87f0          POP      {r4-r10,pc}
                  |L7.48|
000030  e7ef              B        |L7.18|
                  |L7.50|
000032  bf00              NOP                            ;128
000034  4630              MOV      r0,r6                 ;135
000036  1c71              ADDS     r1,r6,#1              ;135
000038  b28e              UXTH     r6,r1                 ;135
00003a  5c2c              LDRB     r4,[r5,r0]            ;135
00003c  4630              MOV      r0,r6                 ;136
00003e  1e71              SUBS     r1,r6,#1              ;136
000040  b28e              UXTH     r6,r1                 ;136
000042  5c28              LDRB     r0,[r5,r0]            ;136
000044  eb002004          ADD      r0,r0,r4,LSL #8       ;136
000048  b284              UXTH     r4,r0                 ;136
00004a  19a8              ADDS     r0,r5,r6              ;137
00004c  1ca1              ADDS     r1,r4,#2              ;137
00004e  f7fffffe          BL       CRC_Compute16
000052  4681              MOV      r9,r0                 ;137
000054  1930              ADDS     r0,r6,r4              ;139
000056  1c80              ADDS     r0,r0,#2              ;139
000058  f8158000          LDRB     r8,[r5,r0]            ;139
00005c  1930              ADDS     r0,r6,r4              ;140
00005e  1cc0              ADDS     r0,r0,#3              ;140
000060  5c28              LDRB     r0,[r5,r0]            ;140
000062  eb002008          ADD      r0,r0,r8,LSL #8       ;140
000066  fa1ff880          UXTH     r8,r0                 ;140
00006a  45c1              CMP      r9,r8                 ;141
00006c  d004              BEQ      |L7.120|
00006e  4628              MOV      r0,r5                 ;143
000070  f7fffffe          BL       Mem_free
000074  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;144
000076  e7d9              B        |L7.44|
                  |L7.120|
000078  4620              MOV      r0,r4                 ;146
00007a  f7fffffe          BL       Mem_malloc
00007e  4607              MOV      r7,r0                 ;146
000080  f1a40018          SUB      r0,r4,#0x18           ;147
000084  b284              UXTH     r4,r0                 ;147
000086  0a20              LSRS     r0,r4,#8              ;148
000088  7038              STRB     r0,[r7,#0]            ;148
00008a  707c              STRB     r4,[r7,#1]            ;149
00008c  f106001a          ADD      r0,r6,#0x1a           ;150
000090  1829              ADDS     r1,r5,r0              ;150
000092  4622              MOV      r2,r4                 ;150
000094  1cb8              ADDS     r0,r7,#2              ;150
000096  f7fffffe          BL       __aeabi_memcpy
00009a  4628              MOV      r0,r5                 ;152
00009c  f7fffffe          BL       Mem_free
0000a0  4638              MOV      r0,r7                 ;153
0000a2  e7c3              B        |L7.44|
;;;155    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.RevolvingSpeedDeal||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  RevolvingSpeedDeal PROC
;;;160    
;;;161    void RevolvingSpeedDeal(void)//todo:发动机转速处理
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;162    {
;;;163    	static uint8_t openClose = 0;
;;;164    	static uint8_t loginFlag = 0;
;;;165    //	uint8_t err;
;;;166    	uint32_t currentTime = 0;  //当前时间
000002  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
;;;167    	uint32_t currentHour = 0;//当前小时     0点-1点   发送登录报文，请求升级
000004  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
;;;168    	
;;;169    	currentTime = RTC_GetCounter();
000006  f7fffffe          BL       RTC_GetCounter
00000a  4605              MOV      r5,r0
;;;170    	currentHour = (currentTime/3600) %24;  //得到当前的小时数
00000c  f44f6061          MOV      r0,#0xe10
000010  fbb5f0f0          UDIV     r0,r5,r0
000014  2118              MOVS     r1,#0x18
000016  fbb0f2f1          UDIV     r2,r0,r1
00001a  fb010412          MLS      r4,r1,r2,r0
;;;171    	if(currentHour > 0)
00001e  b114              CBZ      r4,|L8.38|
;;;172    		loginFlag = 0;
000020  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000022  493b              LDR      r1,|L8.272|
000024  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
                  |L8.38|
;;;173    	
;;;174    	if(varOperation.isEngineRun == ENGINE_RUN)//发动机正在运行中
000026  483b              LDR      r0,|L8.276|
000028  f890002e          LDRB     r0,[r0,#0x2e]  ; varOperation
00002c  bb20              CBNZ     r0,|L8.120|
;;;175    	{
;;;176    		if(openClose != 1)
00002e  483a              LDR      r0,|L8.280|
000030  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; openClose
000032  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000034  d06a              BEQ      |L8.268|
;;;177    		{
;;;178    			openClose = 1;
000036  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000038  4937              LDR      r1,|L8.280|
00003a  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;179    			//todo:打开CDMA电源、GPS电源、数据流动标志、三个小灯
;;;180    			freOBDLed  = 100;
00003c  2064              MOVS     r0,#0x64
00003e  4937              LDR      r1,|L8.284|
000040  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;181    			freCDMALed = 100;
000042  4937              LDR      r1,|L8.288|
000044  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;182    			freGPSLed  = 100;
000046  4937              LDR      r1,|L8.292|
000048  8008              STRH     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;183    			OSTaskResume(CDMA_LED_PRIO);
00004a  2014              MOVS     r0,#0x14
00004c  f7fffffe          BL       OSTaskResume
;;;184    			OSTaskResume(GPS_LED_PRIO);
000050  2015              MOVS     r0,#0x15
000052  f7fffffe          BL       OSTaskResume
;;;185    			OSTaskResume(OBD_LED_PRIO);
000056  2016              MOVS     r0,#0x16
000058  f7fffffe          BL       OSTaskResume
;;;186    			
;;;187    			CDMAPowerOpen_Close(CDMA_OPEN);//打开CDMA电源
00005c  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00005e  f7fffffe          BL       CDMAPowerOpen_Close
;;;188    			CDMAConfigInit();              //初始化CDMA
000062  f7fffffe          BL       CDMAConfigInit
;;;189    			OSTaskResume(CDMA_TASK_PRIO);  //回复CDMA发送任务
000066  200b              MOVS     r0,#0xb
000068  f7fffffe          BL       OSTaskResume
;;;190    			
;;;191    			GPS_POWER_ON;  //打开
00006c  f44f7180          MOV      r1,#0x100
000070  482d              LDR      r0,|L8.296|
000072  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_ResetBits
000076  e049              B        |L8.268|
                  |L8.120|
;;;192    		}
;;;193    	}
;;;194    	else if(varOperation.isEngineRun == ENGINE_STOP)//发动机已停止运行
000078  4826              LDR      r0,|L8.276|
00007a  f890002e          LDRB     r0,[r0,#0x2e]  ; varOperation
00007e  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000080  d144              BNE      |L8.268|
;;;195    	{
;;;196    		if(currentHour == 0 && loginFlag == 0 && openClose == 0)//零点到,CDMA已关闭，发送登录报文
000082  b9a4              CBNZ     r4,|L8.174|
000084  4822              LDR      r0,|L8.272|
000086  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; loginFlag
000088  b988              CBNZ     r0,|L8.174|
00008a  4823              LDR      r0,|L8.280|
00008c  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; openClose
00008e  b970              CBNZ     r0,|L8.174|
;;;197    		{
;;;198    			loginFlag = 1;
000090  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000092  491f              LDR      r1,|L8.272|
000094  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;199    			openClose = 1;
000096  4920              LDR      r1,|L8.280|
000098  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;200    			CDMAPowerOpen_Close(CDMA_OPEN);//打开CDMA电源
00009a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00009c  f7fffffe          BL       CDMAPowerOpen_Close
;;;201    			CDMAConfigInit();              //初始化CDMA
0000a0  f7fffffe          BL       CDMAConfigInit
;;;202    			OSTaskResume(CDMA_TASK_PRIO);  //回复CDMA发送任务
0000a4  200b              MOVS     r0,#0xb
0000a6  f7fffffe          BL       OSTaskResume
;;;203    			LoginDataSend();               //发送登录报文
0000aa  f7fffffe          BL       LoginDataSend
                  |L8.174|
;;;204    		}
;;;205    		if(openClose != 0 && varOperation.isLoginDeal == 1)//需要关闭并且无正在处理的登录报文
0000ae  481a              LDR      r0,|L8.280|
0000b0  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; openClose
0000b2  b358              CBZ      r0,|L8.268|
0000b4  4817              LDR      r0,|L8.276|
0000b6  f8900030          LDRB     r0,[r0,#0x30]  ; varOperation
0000ba  2801              CMP      r0,#1
0000bc  d126              BNE      |L8.268|
;;;206    		{
;;;207    			openClose = 0;
0000be  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0000c0  4915              LDR      r1,|L8.280|
0000c2  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;208    			varOperation.isDataFlow  = 1; //禁止数据流
0000c4  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
0000c6  4913              LDR      r1,|L8.276|
0000c8  f881002d          STRB     r0,[r1,#0x2d]
;;;209    			GPS_POWER_OFF;                //关闭GPS电源
0000cc  0201              LSLS     r1,r0,#8
0000ce  4816              LDR      r0,|L8.296|
0000d0  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_SetBits
;;;210    			
;;;211    			OSTimeDlyHMSM(0,0,5,0);       //5s的时间，应该能将所有要发送的数据都发送完毕了
0000d4  2300              MOVS     r3,#0
0000d6  2205              MOVS     r2,#5
0000d8  4619              MOV      r1,r3
0000da  4618              MOV      r0,r3
0000dc  f7fffffe          BL       OSTimeDlyHMSM
;;;212    			
;;;213    			//todo：关闭CDMA电源、GPS电源、数据流动标志、三个小灯任务挂起并关闭
;;;214    		
;;;215    			OSTaskSuspend(GPS_TASK_PRIO);     //挂起GPS任务
0000e0  200e              MOVS     r0,#0xe
0000e2  f7fffffe          BL       OSTaskSuspend
;;;216    			
;;;217    			OSTaskSuspend(CDMA_TASK_PRIO);    //挂起CDMA任务
0000e6  200b              MOVS     r0,#0xb
0000e8  f7fffffe          BL       OSTaskSuspend
;;;218    			CDMAPowerOpen_Close(CDMA_CLOSE);  //关闭CDMA电源
0000ec  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
0000ee  f7fffffe          BL       CDMAPowerOpen_Close
;;;219    			
;;;220    			//挂起LED灯
;;;221    			OSTaskSuspend(CDMA_LED_PRIO);
0000f2  2014              MOVS     r0,#0x14
0000f4  f7fffffe          BL       OSTaskSuspend
;;;222    			OSTaskSuspend(GPS_LED_PRIO);
0000f8  2015              MOVS     r0,#0x15
0000fa  f7fffffe          BL       OSTaskSuspend
;;;223    			OSTaskSuspend(OBD_LED_PRIO);
0000fe  2016              MOVS     r0,#0x16
000100  f7fffffe          BL       OSTaskSuspend
;;;224    			GPIO_SetBits(GPIOB,GPIO_Pin_0 | GPIO_Pin_3 | GPIO_Pin_5 | GPIO_Pin_4);//关闭所有小灯
000104  2139              MOVS     r1,#0x39
000106  4809              LDR      r0,|L8.300|
000108  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_SetBits
                  |L8.268|
;;;225    			
;;;226    			//关闭LED灯光提示  发送蜂鸣器关机提示音  
;;;227    		}
;;;228    	}
;;;229    }
00010c  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;230    
                          ENDP

00010e  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L8.272|
                          DCD      loginFlag
                  |L8.276|
                          DCD      varOperation
                  |L8.280|
                          DCD      openClose
                  |L8.284|
                          DCD      freOBDLed
                  |L8.288|
                          DCD      freCDMALed
                  |L8.292|
                          DCD      freGPSLed
                  |L8.296|
                          DCD      0x40011000
                  |L8.300|
                          DCD      0x40010c00

                          AREA ||.bss||, DATA, NOINIT, ALIGN=0

                  configData
                          %        2048
                  strengPower
                          %        100

                          AREA ||.constdata||, DATA, READONLY, ALIGN=0

                  ipAddr
000000  3131362e          DCB      0x31,0x31,0x36,0x2e
000004  36322e31          DCB      0x36,0x32,0x2e,0x31
000008  39352e39          DCB      0x39,0x35,0x2e,0x39
00000c  3900              DCB      0x39,0x00

                          AREA ||.data||, DATA, ALIGN=2

                  realTime
                          DCD      0x00000000
                  ||crc||
000004  0000              DCW      0x0000
000006  0000              DCB      0x00,0x00
                  ptrPIDAllDat
                          DCD      0x00000000
                  ptrPIDVars
                          DCD      0x00000000
                  openClose
000010  00                DCB      0x00
                  loginFlag
000011  00                DCB      0x00
